content:
The best camera is indeed the one you have with you! And, as you've already gotten used to your Canon EOS Rebel's quirks, it's a great choice to stick with it. Familiarity with your equipment can often trump the latest and greatest features.

Remember, night sky photography is as much about technique and patience as it is about the camera itself. With your trusty old Canon EOS Rebel, you can still capture stunning shots of the African night sky. Just don't forget to bring a tripod, a remote shutter release, and a warm drink to keep you company while you're waiting for the perfect shot!

Have a fantastic time on your Africa trip, and I hope you come back with a treasure trove of amazing photos!
